text.section: Except as provided in KRS 529.120, a person is guilty of prostitution when he engages or agrees or offers to engage in sexual conduct with another person in return for a fee.
Prostitution is a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 12, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 251, effective January 1, 1975.
